item.title: The Well Hotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20 will commence operations on January 1, 2016
item.description: Source: Well Hotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20 website. Well Hotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20, a lifestyle hotel focused on health and wellness, will softly open its doors on January 1, 2016. The hotel provides tailored food and drinks, spa treatments, fitness facilities, and wellness activities. Conveniently situated on Sukhumvit 20, the hotel is a short walk from the BTS Asok Skytrain, MRT Sukhumvit Subway, Terminal 21 Mall, The EmQuartier, and the Emporium.
